channel.title: New dragon gate inn
channel.description:
following https://forums.gauntlet-rpg.com/t/what-are-you-working-on-right-now/1322/327 and askew to https://forums.gauntlet-rpg.com/t/rpgs-arent-movies/7231 ...
I made my wuxia game. Not with Otherkind, but RPS, both for gamefeel and because it gelled down this way. I'll submit it to 1 page RPG jam.
Wuxia lovers from TheGauntlet, I am calling to you to critic this game (sensitivity reading etc.) and help me with all the design-fu and savoury wuxia seeds you can bring. https://dereel.itch.io/storm-at-the-desert-gate-inn

item.title: New dragon gate inn
item.dc:creator: @DeReel
item.description:
@DeReel wrote:

following What are you working on right now? and askew to "RPGs aren't movies" …

I made my wuxia game. Not with Otherkind, but RPS, both for gamefeel and because it gelled down this way.
I’ll submit it to 1 page RPG jam.

Wuxia lovers from TheGauntlet, I am calling to you to critic this game (sensitivity reading etc.) and help me with all the design-fu and savoury wuxia seeds you can bring.

itch.io

Storm at the Desert Gate Inn by DeReel

... a 1 page RPG of wuxia splendor
